segments.text: You have been doing a great job this year and I am very satisfied with your work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am very happy to know my work could be recognized by you and our company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Based on your contribution , I would like to give you a pay raise . Your monthly salary will be increased by 800 Yuan . This increase includes an 80 % married increase based on your achievements and increase responsibilities and then the additional 20 % increase were reflecting the changes in cost of living .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really appreciate it . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S2
